title: Kurgo Loft Bench Car Seat Cover for Dogs - Waterproof, Reversible Pet Seat Cover - Fits Most Cars, Trucks & SUVs – Backseat Protection for Scratches, Stains & Dog Hair - Coastal Blue/Charcoal Grey
features: Protect your car seats: protect your car back seat from mud and dirt with the water and stain resistant Kurgo loft dog bench Seat cover. The Piped panels keep dirt and water from rolling off cover onto carpeting.

Reversible Microtomic ripstop material: the water resistant microtomictm ripstop material with poly fill is one of our hardiest materials, designed to be tough to match your adventurous lifestyle. Car seat cover is reversible from coastal blue with orange piping to charcoal Grey.

Sizing &fit: Car cover is 55 inches wide and provides a universal fit for most vehicles. Under seat and behind Seat attachments ensure a snug fit. Zippered pockets allow the use of seat belts, pet restraints, and child car seat latches.
Care instructions: The bench seat cover is meant to get dirty, and when it does Simply machine wash on cold with mild detergent. Hang to dry.
description: When adventure calls, the Loft Bench Seat Cover will be there to protect from dirt, debris, and water.
is designed to be tough but still provide a cozy spot for your tired pup to rest. The piped panels keep dirt and water from rolling off the cover onto carpeting.
Reversible from Coastal Blue with orange piping to Charcoal Grey.
Microtomic ripstop material with poly fill make it durable and warm.
Piped panels to keep dirt and water from rolling off cover onto carpeting.
Under seat and behind seat attachments for a snug fit.
Zippered pockets allow use of seat belts, pet restraints, and child car seat latches.
Cover is 55” wide, providing a universal fit for most vehicles. For trucks and large SUVs, you may consider the Kurgo Extended Bench Seat Cover for Trucks and SUVs which is 63" wide.
Please measure the width of the seating area of your bench seat (from left to right) to know whether the cover might fit.
